name: Hide and Go Freeze
description:
LéoToday at 5:13 PM

Jim the slime got stuck Nunavut

[5:13 PM]Help him not die

RicardoToday at 5:14 PM

JJ was reincarnated as a slime but he was born in reverse florida and the only thing that can save him from not freezing is by collecting the sacred space heaters

LéoToday at 5:21 PM

Thats a yikes from me

AedynToday at 5:22 PM

did you upload it?

LéoToday at 5:22 PM

JJ is currently uploading

Or smt. Anyways

Controls:
-WASD To move (arrows work on snow but not ice for some reason)
-Spacebar to zoom out (only on snow)

Objective: collect all radiators. You can only collect the red ones, and the slime above your head turn red as you get closer (also shake less and be more visible, but you get the idea)
